kDesc

Black wraparound sunglasses as worn by The Terminator. Part of The Terminator character clothing set. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. Lunettes de soleil panoramiques identiques à celles portées par le Terminator. Disponibles dans le lot de vêtements du Terminator. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. Schwarze Wraparound-Sonnenbrille wie vom Terminator getragen. Teil des Kleidungssets für den Charakter Terminator. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.
